name: Henry (John)
description:
You simply need to touch the red brick at the end of the level and collect the pellets as you go. You character has a stamina bar and the more you move/jump will decrease. Collecting the pellets will increase your stamina.

Watch out for the blocks! As you touch the blocks they will begin to disappear so move off them before you fall into the abyss.

Controls
Enter = Accept
Space = Jump (Hold to jump higher)
a = left
d = right
esc = pause

You can also use a controller

this is my first ever game so don’t judge me too harshly 😂
